meanings.definition: The unit of electric charge in the centimeter-gram-second system, equal to one-tenth of a coulomb.
meanings.sent1: An abcoulomb is a small amount of electric charge.
meanings.sent2: Scientists measure electric charge in abcoulombs.
meanings.sent3: When the abcoulomb danced around the circuit, it lit up the room with tiny sparks.
meanings.sent4: The abcoulomb was like a tiny spark of energy, igniting the circuit with its presence.
meanings.sent5: Imagine an abcoulomb as a minuscule lightning bolt, carrying a fraction of the charge.
